titleStmt.title: The true doctrine of justification asserted & vindicated from the errours of many, and more especially papists and Socinians. Or A treatise of the natural righteousness of God, and imputed righteousness of Christ. By Anthony Burgesse pastor of the church at Sutton-Coldfield in Warwickshire.
True doctrine of justification. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Vnderhill, at the Anchor and Bible in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The last leaf bears a vertical half-title: Burgess of justification. Part 2.
Reissued in 1655 as part 2 of "The true doctrine of justification" (Wing B5665).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
